content.rendered:
Sometimes it’s nice to do something unexpected, for yourself or someone else. If you want to do something by yourself or with or for someone else, here are some ideas.

Go shopping, even if it’s just window shopping. It can be nice to just get out of the place you are at.

Take can unexpected trip. You can plan it ahead, throw a dart at a map or just go where the wind takes you. It can be a lot of fun to go somewhere that you’ve never been before.

Build something. Look around and find out what you have to work with and make something. It could be paper mache or wood. You could build something, carve something or decorate something.

Find a game to play, indoors or out. There’s everything form tic-tac-toe to horseshoes and it’s your choice.

Go out to eat or fix a fancy dinner. This may require a little more preparation depending on what you decide to do, but the result could be well worth it. If it is an option, enlist someone to help you.

Maybe one of these caught your attention. Or, perhaps you came up with your own idea. If so, please comment below.
